DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify at least 1 dose of Daclatasvir, that when combined with peginterferon-alfa (PegIFNα) and ribavirin (RBV) for the treatment of chronically infected HCV genotype 1 treatment-naïve and non-responder to standard of care subjects is safe, well tolerated, and efficacious
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Daclatasvir (BMS-790052) Plus Standard of Care in Japanese Patients (Pegylated-interferon Alpha-2a and Ribavirin)
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects chronically infected with hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 1 HCV RNA viral load ≥ 10*5* IU/mL (100,000 IU/mL) at screening The current standard of care naïve or nonresponder Key Cirrhosis HCC Coinfection with hepatitis B virus (HBV), HIV1 or HIV2
